channel.title: Alex Craig's blog
channel.description: A collection of my thoughts and anecdotes

item.title: Tunic - A glimpse to the past
item.description: A brief spoiler free review of the game Tunic.

item.title: Writing is hard
item.description: Some musings about my difficulties with learning to write as a hobby.

item.title: First release of MTG Card Seer
item.description: A new JavaScript library I'm developing for MTG card image previewing on the web.

item.title: MTG Arena July 2021 season in review
item.description: A brief review of the past Magic the Gathering Arena monthly ladder season exclusively playing a Historic Yorion Doom Foretold homebrew.

item.title: Death's Door - The good, the bad and the ugly
item.description: A brief spoiler free review of the game Death's Door.

item.title: Frustrations with the MTG Arena client
item.description: The MTG Arena client is both a godsend and awful at the same time for game play.

item.title: MTG Arena April 2021 season in review
item.description: A brief review of the past Magic the Gathering Arena monthly ladder season for historic.

item.title: MTG deck archive: Strixhaven release
item.description: A snapshot of the decks that I was playing with in Historic prior to the release of Strixhaven.

item.title: Strixhaven & the Historic shakeup
item.description: What I'm looking forward to in Historic with the release of Strixhaven.

item.title: MTG Arena March 2021 season in review
item.description: A brief review of the past Magic the Gathering Arena monthly ladder season for both standard and historic.

item.title: Why I'm starting a blog
item.description: A brief discussion on why I have decided to create and maintain a blog in this day and age.
